promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic epic lizard psychic-type pokemon wearing a golden crystal headband. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptogoldra, a a dynamic epic lizard psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Psycho Boost. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "psychic" or "Cryptogoldra". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, lizard-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, galaxy background
generatedDescription: This spectral saurian dwells in subterranean tombs, harnessing Psycho Boost to manipulate its gilded scales and predict intruders' moves.
